price: 92. Cette religion[331] est la vôtre et c’est une religion unique. Je suis votre Seigneur, alors adorez-Moi.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-anā rabbukum fa-uʿ'budūni
